name: Just Jump Up - Twitch Chat Integration Game
name_original: Just Jump Up - Twitch Chat Integration Game
description:
Just Jump Up is a small questionable-quality game aka LIDL game where Twitch Chat can control the platforms by using commands in chat, or if the Randomizer setting is on just by typing in chat whatever they would normally say (PepeLaugh wrong way Mr. Streamer).

Find a way to work with your chat together or jump all the way to the top despite their trolling. Settings such as "Minimum time between moves" and "Speed & Distance in 1 move" can help you change your experience depending on how fast/active your chat is, as well as if you want a more tactical approach or straight up chaos (turn up the Speed to 10 and set Time between moves to 0).

If you're just a viewer or a small streamer and want to experience the game fully (by the way, the game is beatable in "static" mode too, with 0 platform moves), you can enter some active streamer's chat and put the Randomizer on, it will transform every message into a command, only thing left for you is to Just Jump Up.
